attributes.additional_details:
We all see posts on Facebook of parents becoming upset over non parents parking in parent spaces. 
A simple badge system to ensure these spaces are used for those who really need them. 
These spaces do not need to be near the door of the shop it's the space that is needed. 
The green badge approach will ensure these spaces are used the way the should be.
attributes.background: Just like the blue badge for disabled parking. I am proposing a green badge for parent parking. This badge to be given with the bounty pack on the birth of you child with a 5 year expiry date. This is to ensure parent parking spaces are used for parents. Thank you for your help and support
